prClaws/

The mole's team threw without ceremony Bullet's body in cr, and i=
t started to repair it in level 4; that meant that the bot would able walk =
but not fight or defend himself; and process would take a large while.

o/Celeno/Ocipite:

The ladies walked towards mess hall.

end (Chameleon) was the one who hit the alarm." She fealt
  little sympathy=

  ranking, Blaze =
deffinitely fealt pages behind in the novel of life, first
  chance she got=

  priveliges.

ree femms began talking again, Blaze stepped back to where they were

nswer them. "OK, I'll follow." She said answering all thier questions at

once, she moved a little closer. "Lead the way." She was taking a chance bu=
t
  in order to find her answers she had to be patient and take a few risks=
.

  > Deepfear, Charon, Underground and Sharpcraws took Bullet and carried=
